verses.verse: Now when Abram <S%H87><s%> was ninety-nine years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to Abram <S%H87><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "I am God <S%H410><s%> Almighty; <S%H7706><s%> Walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Me, and be blameless. <S%H8549><s%>
"And I will establish <S%H5414><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Me and you, And I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> you exceedingly. <S%H3966><s%>"
And Abram <S%H87><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on his face, <S%H6440><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> with him, saying, <S%H559><s%>
"As for Me, behold, <S%H2009><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> is with you, And you shall be the father of a multitude <S%H1><s%> of nations. <S%H1995><s%>

"No <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> shall your name <S%H8034><s%> be called <S%H7121><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> But your name <S%H8034><s%> shall be Abraham; <S%H85><s%> For I will make <S%H5414><s%> you the father of a multitude <S%H1><s%> of nations. <S%H1995><s%>

"And I will make <S%H6509><s%> you exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> of you, and kings <S%H4428><s%> shall come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from you.

"And I will establish <S%H6965><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Me and you and your descendants <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%> to be God <S%H430><s%> to you and to your descendants <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you.

"And I will give <S%H5414><s%> to you and to your descendants <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you, the land <S%H776><s%> of your sojournings, <S%H4033><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> possession; <S%H272><s%> and I will be their God. <S%H430><s%>"

God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> further to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> "Now as for you, you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> My covenant, <S%H1285><s%> you and your descendants <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you throughout their generations. <S%H1755><s%>

"This <S%H2088><s%> is My covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall keep, <S%H8104><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Me and you and your descendants <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you: every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> among you shall be circumcised. <S%H4135><s%>

"And you shall be circumcised <S%H4135><s%> in the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your foreskin; <S%H6190><s%> and it shall be the sign <S%H226><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Me and you.

"And every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> among you who is eight <S%H8083><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shall be circumcised <S%H4135><s%> throughout your generations, <S%H1755><s%> a [servant] who <S%H3211><s%> is born <S%H3211><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> or who <S%H4736><s%> is bought <S%H4736><s%> with money <S%H3701><s%> from any <S%H3605><s%> foreigner, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is not of your descendants. <S%H2233><s%>

"A [servant] who <S%H3211><s%> is born <S%H3211><s%> in your house <S%H1004><s%> or who <S%H4736><s%> is bought <S%H4736><s%> with your money <S%H3701><s%> shall surely <S%H4135><s%> be circumcised; <S%H4135><s%> thus shall My covenant <S%H1285><s%> be in your flesh <S%H1320><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

"But an uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is not circumcised <S%H4135><s%> in the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin, <S%H6190><s%> that person <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> from his people; <S%H9415><s%> he has broken <S%H6565><s%> My covenant. <S%H1285><s%>"

Then God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> "As for Sarai <S%H8297><s%> your wife, <S%H802><s%> you shall not call <S%H7121><s%> her name <S%H8034><s%> Sarai, <S%H8297><s%> but Sarah <S%H8283><s%> [shall be] her name. <S%H8034><s%>

"And I will bless <S%H1288><s%> her, and indeed <S%H1571><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> you a son <S%H1121><s%> by her. Then I will bless <S%H1288><s%> her, and she shall be [a mother of] nations; <S%H1471><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of peoples <S%H5971><s%> shall come <S%H1961><s%> from her."

Then Abraham <S%H85><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%> and laughed, <S%H6711><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> "Will a child be born <S%H3205><s%> to a man <S%H1121><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>? And will Sarah, <S%H8283><s%> who is ninety <S%H8673><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1323><s%> bear <S%H3205><s%> [a child?]"
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> "Oh <S%H3863><s%> that Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> might live <S%H2421><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee!"

But God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "No, <S%H61><s%> but Sarah <S%H8283><s%> your wife <S%H802><s%> shall bear <S%H3205><s%> you a son, <S%H1121><s%> and you shall call <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Isaac; <S%H3327><s%> and I will establish <S%H6965><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> for his descendants <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.

"And as for Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> I have heard <S%H8085><s%> you; behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will bless <S%H1288><s%> him, and will make <S%H6509><s%> him fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and will multiply <S%H7235><s%> him exceedingly. <S%H3966><s%> He shall become <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> princes, <S%H5387><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> him a great <S%H1419><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%>

"But My covenant <S%H1285><s%> I will establish <S%H6965><s%> with Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Sarah <S%H8283><s%> will bear <S%H3205><s%> to you at this <S%H2088><s%> season <S%H4150><s%> next <S%H312><s%> year. <S%H8141><s%>"
And when He finished <S%H3615><s%> talking <S%H1696><s%> with him, God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up from Abraham. <S%H85><s%>

Then Abraham <S%H85><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> [the servants] who <S%H3211><s%> were born <S%H3211><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H4736><s%> were bought <S%H4736><s%> with his money, <S%H3701><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> among the men <S%H376><s%> of Abraham's household, <S%H1004><s%> and circumcised <S%H4135><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of their foreskin <S%H6190><s%> in the very <S%H6106><s%> same <S%H6106><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> as God <S%H430><s%> had said <S%H1696><s%> to him.
Now Abraham <S%H85><s%> was ninety-nine years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he was circumcised <S%H4135><s%> in the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin. <S%H6190><s%>

And Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> was thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he was circumcised <S%H4135><s%> in the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin. <S%H6190><s%>
In the very <S%H6106><s%> same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> was circumcised, <S%H4135><s%> and Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of his household, <S%H1004><s%> who <S%H3211><s%> were born <S%H3211><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> or bought <S%H4736><s%> with money <S%H3701><s%> from a foreigner, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> were circumcised <S%H4135><s%> with him.
